level.text: The purpose of these rules is to establish procedures that shall apply to each fair hearing provided by CFSA.
Copies of these rules shall be available from CFSA upon request.

If a chapter of the DCMR concerning a CFSA program or service for which a fair hearing is provided under ยง 5901.1(a) establishes a procedure or time frame different from that established by this Chapter 59, the requirements of the other chapter control.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency published at 47 DCR 6035 (July 28, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Emergency published at 48 DCR 10067 (November 2, 2001) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 2440 (March 15, 2002).
